name: Dance with Chance 🎲
description:
Entry created in Unity for the game-jam Mini-Jam 95.  Idea, code & all assets were made in 1 day.

Theme  Limitation  ChanceNo RNG

Dance with Chance (the dice) to some funky tunes by performing the correct moves at the right time 🎶.

Guitar Hero but with a dice!

Controls

  • Mouse1 or  WASD/Arrows - Flip the dice to one side

Source code (not pretty)
pyrbin/dance-with-chance (github.com)

Made by Frans, Jottis, Isak & James
